fields.name: Rules
fields.value:
- You can roll twice to make combos, each roll lowers your payout until breakeven(x1).
- If you do not succeed at beating(haha) a score of 300 you bust ğŸ’¦ and lose your bet.
- Kept dice cannot be used to make combos in subsequent rolls.
- Multiple combos are allowed in a single roll
- Your total score is calculated at the end of each roll, so keep track of the current roll's score to end the round as early as possible.
- Ending the round does not count as a roll, and will auto-keep all remaining dice.

fields.name: Combos
fields.value:
Single 1s -  100 points each
Single 5s -  50 points each
Three of a kind - 
1 -  1000 points
2 -  200 points
3 -  300 points
4 -  400 points
5 -  500 points
6 -  600 points
More to cum...
